description: This file contains a simple test class 'PlaceholderTest' that uses JUnit5 to define a trivial test method ensuring the test runner recognizes at least one test.

classes.name: PlaceholderTest
classes.description: A test class used as a placeholder to verify the test runner discovers tests and to prevent build failures due to no tests being detected.

methods.name: placeholder_passes
methods.description: A test method that always passes to ensure the test runner can find and execute at least one test.
